!MESSAGE Breakpoint does not have an associated marker.

Unfortunately, I've currently no test case to help you to reproduce the problem.
Let me know what kind of extra information you may need to track this...

Is it possible that you triggered a hot code replace (changed a class file), 
and then removed some breakpoints immediately?

Yes, I did some hot code replace and also add/remove some breakpoint during this
debug session. Moreover, I perhaps have made some hot code replace on code in
which a breakpoint was set...

Just got this with I200409240800.

I was hot-code-replacing two CUs (did a replace with latest from HEAD). At least
one of the CUs contained a breakpoint. The HCR failed in the Plugin-Test target
which had already loaded the classes. The other debuggee was a Run-time
Workbench which had not yet loaded the classes.

Stacktrace with slightly changed line numbers:
